summary: REQ-1 appears partially implemented: the document title, Layout fallback site name, and LoadingScreen text were updated to "3Docarinas". However, the diff summary does not provide enough evidence to confirm that *all* other public-facing pages/areas (e.g., homepage hero, footer) have no remaining "Ocarina" strings. Additionally, Layout includes a new dynamic favicon-update behavior that is outside the requested renaming/relabeling scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other visible UI strings on the public-facing pages refer to the old app name (manual spot-check: header, footer, loading screen, and homepage hero area).
missing_requirements.reason: While the header fallback text and loading screen text were updated, the diff summary does not show changes (or a search/removal) in other public-facing UI areas like the homepage hero or footer, so it cannot be confirmed that no remaining "Ocarina" strings exist outside the shown files.

hallucinated_features.description: Dynamic favicon update based on branding icon (removes existing favicon links and injects a new one via useEffect).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest constrained changes to renaming/relabeling and explicitly said not to introduce new features; favicon manipulation is new behavior not required to rename app text.
